articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: The EU wants to end all Russian gas imports. Moscow's friends in the bloc say it's a 'serious mistake' - CNBC
articles.description: Russia's friends in Eastern Europe say EU plans to end all Russian gas and energy imports are tantamount to "economic suicide" and a threat to energy security.
articles.content: Russia's allies in Eastern Europe say Brussels plans to end all Russian gas and energy imports in the coming years are tantamount to "economic suicide" and a threat to the region's energy security an… [+4582 chars]
